website_summaries.verdict: An eco-friendly option for pizza lovers. Made of bamboo wood.
pros: Users report that the board is very durable
Made of environmentally friendly bamboo, which is naturally anti-microbial
cons: A little small compared to some other pizza peels

customer_reviews.title: Touch the dough to a hot stone
customer_reviews.text: Great peel! I used it twice so far. I’m not sure most people know how to use a peel. You have to touch the dough to a hot pizza stone and this pulls the pizza off the peel. I had a friend trying to shake it off the peel with no flour on the peel all’s that will do is make a mess in your oven lol! Pay attention and watch a video if needed. This peel is perfect for smaller type pizza.
customer_reviews.author: CJfalco

customer_reviews.title: Used it like 4 times which means 4 washes and there is ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it like 4 times which means 4 washes and there is cracking in the middle of my board. Kind of disappointed because I expected an expensive cutting board should last more than 4 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I wanted to see if I could burn/sear/singe every finger and most of the hairs on my arms first before wising up and purcha
customer_reviews.text: Received our Pizza Peel and honestly do not know why I waited so long. Maybe I wanted to see if I could burn/sear/singe every finger and most of the hairs on my arms first before wising up and purchasing the best one I could find. I have used it twice and it is great! Also, it is too attractive to hide in a cabinet, we have ours hanging on the wall near the oven. The only downside are the flashbacks I get from trips to the asst. principal's office in high school...he had something similar hanging on his wall. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: J. D

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: The pizza paddle works wonderfully with a dusting of flour. I make the pizza right on the paddle and then slide the pizza onto the pizza stone. In order to lift the pizza off the pizza stone, I do need a pair of tongs to pull the pizza onto the paddle.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Great but a little small
customer_reviews.text: This pizza peel is a little small for my purpose, because the pizzas from my kitchen are generally 14 inches in size. However, the pizza peel is useful to use for moving smaller items in and out of the oven. The wood is finely crafted and could be used as a cutting board as well as for serving. If the pizza peel is couple inches larger, my rating would have been 5 stars. If your pizza is 12 inches or smaller, then this pizza peel works well for you. If not, you would not find this item satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: H. Tak Cheung

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for the home pizzaria
customer_reviews.text: This peel serves its purpose well. It’s very sturdy. I gave 4 stars for ease of cleaning.....but that may have been because you really need to flour it quite a bit to keep dough from sticking...so maybe my fault. As for maneuverability, I gave 4 stars because it’s fairly heavy so you need to be very careful once a loaded pizza is on it. But that also reflects upon its sturdiness. I washed with only hot water and a sponge....no soap which could be absorbed.....Overall, a 5-star product
customer_reviews.author: ScubaDude

customer_reviews.title: Spilt and no warranty. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for three months and less than a dozen times and it split right down the middle all the way through to the point where it will break off if I use it again. I don’t want to glue it because of contact with food. I do not have the company info but I’ll see if I can find it to determine if it’s covered under a warranty. More to follow. Update: I sent the company an email requesting a warranty replacement and have not gotten a response. I would not recommend that anyone but this product. It does not hold up and there is no warranty. Amazon Has done nothing to correct this.
customer_reviews.author: DarrellC

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a chef
customer_reviews.text: I am suprised I waited this long to get this. Love it. And the brand is exceptional. We received the product really quickly. Love that its made out of natural bamboo. Almost too pretty to use. Very please with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: IslandSpice

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived with a split paddle board
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed when the product arrived with a split in the bamboo board where the pizza should rest. For the premium price charged over other competitive versions of the same product, I would have expected better quality control from the folks that make the Pizza Royale Bamboo Pizza peel to be better. Ruined our weekend pizza making event at home with our guest.
customer_reviews.author: BruThruMan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality wood
customer_reviews.text: Pizza would not slide off. Regardless of quantity of flour or corn meal. Poor quality wood. Threw in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph French

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comfortabl
customer_reviews.text: The grip is comfortable in your hand and the peel is very sturdy. It does not have a formed grip, but it is not uncomfortable by any means. It is very smooth and sanded well to be able to easily slide a pizza on and off. It fits a medium size pizza or smaller very well. A large pizza could work with some finagling, but we like to make personal size so that we can choose our own topping options.
customer_reviews.author: Kaila

customer_reviews.title: Old folks who want a personal pizza
customer_reviews.text: I saw this is for kids, but what a funny. I am at the point in my life that a personal size pizza is what my husband and I are eating. Plus, I make pizzas for the grandchildren. Whom each one wants different stuff on theirs. I have a small oven I use in the summertime not to heat up the whole kitchen, and this works great for small ovens that they don't call kids ovens but my kid's size Pizza Peel works super great. Just sayin'.
customer_reviews.author: collette batten

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It cracked in the middle after only 4 times of uses. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki N.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after light use. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.text: This cracked last night while sitting on the counter with a pizza on it. I had just pulled the pizza out of the oven, was waiting for it to cool a bit and heard a large pop. The pizza paddle had cracked. We use this once a month, and don't soak or excessively wet the wood. This is an item that should last indefinitely if it was made well with quality products. I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: A_guy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOOL FOR MAKING THE HOME MADE PIZZA EXPERIENCE BETTER
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality pizza peel. Works well, just obtain proper usage instructions off the internet to ensure making great pizza. We followed recommended steps and used mineral oil to properly cure the peel prior to first use, an important step. As this item is fairly large you might want to think where to store when not being used. I would highly recommend this peel as it is well made from quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Terry E. Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Great bamboo pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this thing since about 4 pizzas ago and really like it. The bamboo finish is durable, smooth, stylish-looking, and easy to clean. It isn't something I would use for a hot wood-fired oven (the wood is too thick and the handle too short) but it's perfect for cutting and serving your pie on. Great for 14" pies but probably wouldn't fit too much bigger.
customer_reviews.author: John Austin

customer_reviews.title: Small and thin - perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my counter top convection oven. I love that this is thin and bevelled along the edge, which makes it very easy to slide under pizza and bread to place on a hot baking stone. Also, nice smooth wood and lightweight. I wipe it down with a dry kitchen towel to keep clean. The oils from pizza/bread keep it nicely seasoned. Its small and thin enough I can store it out of sight on top of the fridge. This was a little something extra I had been wanting for a long time. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NonnieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I make pizza at home - mostly from frozen. The issue has always been the transferring the pie from the oven to the cutting board on the counter. This peel solves that problem completely. It is very sturdy and easy to clean. I also use the peel as a cutting board with a handle - daily. It is a little heavier than expected but that is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tinari

customer_reviews.title: I returned this item
customer_reviews.text: It was no better than the old wooden peel I had and was actually much smaller than I wanted by the time you measure just the surface available for the pizza.
customer_reviews.author: glandpuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for home oven or outdoor grill
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a pizza peel for a long time. The price and looks of this one made me finally commit. No regrets. The size perfect for my homemade dough and pizza stone. Easy to maneuver in the oven or when I put the stone of the grill outside, handle is good length. A little flour and uncooked pizza slides right off. Solid construction makes me believe this will be the only one I'll need to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bunkie Roy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that I would be able to use this properly, but it was so easy! I absolutely love it and want to make pizza every day. My husband and daughter were very complimentary as there were no leftovers. Highly recommend. Be sure to use a generous dusting of cornmeal in the paddle before pressing out your dough.
customer_reviews.author: devoted reader

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, useful product. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was unsure how I felt about this product, but after using it for a month or two, I have grown to really like it. It is so handy to have. It is very sturdy and cleans up easily. I would have preferred a bit more tapering of the leading edge for easier sliding under a pizza, but it still works out okay the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: LG Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Pizza Paddles; price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Received the pizza paddles a few days ago and put it to use immediately. I was impressed with the quality and appearance of the paddles and hang them in the kitchen since they look so nice. The durability and sustainability of bamboo was a big factor in the purchase. Purchased two, one for our second home in Montana. Our group of friends are into making our own gourmet pizzas and pairing it with wines. I plan to purchase additional paddles as gifts for our friends.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: life changer
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very dramatic, but it really did change my life, along with the stone. My kids love neapolitan pizza and i spent a lot of money ordering from our favorite italian restaurant. No more, I looked up a recipe for dough, made it myself and i haven't stopped. it is incredibly easy to use, its not too big and you can make the perfect single sized pizza. Really easy to clean also and because it's flat, easy to store away. I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Careen Fowles

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Oven Essential
customer_reviews.text: Great peel for starting the pizza on. Crust slides off very easily to start cooking. Slightly to thick to turn or remove the pizza with easily but that happens with all wood peels. I have two of these that I use with my Ooni Koda pizza oven and could not cook without them. They also work well for serving cheese. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: UDM2013

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size. Super Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size pizza spatula. It fits in a drawer, holds both frozen pizza size and homemade pizza size. Is long enough to get the pizza onto the stone in a wall oven with the door down (awkwardly high for me since I’m short). This pizza spatula solves the issue. No more struggling to reach over the oven door to get the rack with the pizza stone slid out.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne King

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This pizza peel is perfect. Whether we use regular pizza or cauliflower pizza, the pizza slides easily from the peel to the pizza stone. It is making cooking pizza so much easier and safer. The arm handle length is perfect and the width is excellent for any size pizza we cook. As a little bonus, the wood is just beautiful too.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: We really like this pizza peel. It is professional quality, sturdy and beautiful. In fact, it's so pretty that we ended up using it like a tray to carry our fruit and cheese snacks upstairs when we are watching movies. We plan on purchasing another one strictly for pizza. :D Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very good pizza paddle
customer_reviews.text: Very good pizza paddle. Made of bamboo, which is a good alternative to chopping down normal trees. Very pleased so far, have probably used it on a couple dozen pizzas. It's probably big enough for a 12-14 inch pizza, 16 inch would be pushing it, but may work. Anything bigger will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: BGibbyson

customer_reviews.title: Snapped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pizza peel roughly 6 months ago. I was a big fan of it until it snapped about a month ago. I was scrubbing it in my sink and it snapped clean in half. Not sure if these planks weren’t bonded well enough together or what. I’d most likely consider an aluminum one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: So Happy Together
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to buy one of these? Glad I finally did. It’s beautiful and a good size. Works great and makes homemade pizza so so much nicer than trying to use parchment paper. Just remember to sprinkle a little corn meal on there first and it all slides right off.
customer_reviews.author: T. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pizza paddle
customer_reviews.text: When making fresh pizza the dough can get sticky to the paddle. Just make sure you use plenty of flour what you like, helps the pizza slide off the paddle. The paddle is good for medium size pizzas. I didn't want something too big and make smaller pizza so this paddle was a perfect size work great. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: I used as a Charcuterie Board
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a surface large enough to hold all my cheeses, meats and fruits at my Superbowl party. This Pizza Peel was perfect! I love dual purpose kitchen tools!
customer_reviews.author: janneanj

customer_reviews.title: This arrived today. First the packaging was covered with ...
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today. To be fair, the product itself is excellent quality, well made. However, I was disappointed by two things: First the packaging was covered with something that resembled bird poop. I kid you not. See the photo. Whether it was the manufacturer or Amazon, someone at quality control didn't do their job. I can give the box as a gift as planned. I'm sure it happened in a warehouse, but I would think Amazon would check their packaging better. Second, the pizza peel is too small for a regular size pizza. I guess I should have more carefully looked at the measurements but see how it compares to the one I was replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza peel for home cook use!
customer_reviews.text: We recently started making pizzas at home, and wanted a pizza peel to help maneuver the pizzas between counter and oven. This pizza peel has been great so far! It is sturdy, the handle is comfortable, and has served as a cutting board in a pinch. It will hold 1 larger pizza or 2 personal size pizzas at a time, but is not so large that it can't fit in a kitchen cabinet for storage. Although it is bamboo, I recommend handwashing after use. In addition, the description of this peel is as listed, and I received my shipment quickly. I would recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Diana F.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Small
customer_reviews.text: So... i bought this pizza peal for me to cook a pizza. On the photo it looked big and nice. But when it came it was TINY!!! The pictures said it was 12 inches by 10 inches. I thought that the peal (not including the handle) will be 12x10. When i recieved the package the peal was surprisingly little! It was 12 inches long (INCLUDING THE HANDLE) and ten inches wide. Otherwise its amazing quality and its non stick!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with this product. Not sure how it will hold up over the long haul. The wood doesn't appear to have any cross lamination and had a crack starting down the middle strait from the box. Concerned it will continue to crack and eventually break, or serve as a harbor for bacteria over time. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turns out to be useless for bread
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to go with my new bread baking hobby. Turns out to be useless for bread. It's nicely made and all, though it's not very thin and my wet bread dough ain't never gonna SLIDE off it. I now use a banneton for the second rise and just plop the loaf right onto the baking stone. The recipe for ciabatta said put the second rise onto a peel. I don't agree. But it looks cool like you know what you're doing.
customer_reviews.author: denpick

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece of wood
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of wood. I've used it twice already since receiving it, and the second time felt like an expert. I was delighted with the e-book cookbook, although I do wish the print was a bit larger...need a magnifying glass to read it. But the New York style sauce was delish! I love doing business with a family-owned company, and expect to have many years of enjoyment and use from our new pizza peel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Pizza Peel & Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Really great peel! The quality is excellent, as is the customer service. They reached out to me to make sure everything was going well, and I responded with a couple questions. They were quick to reply and were very helpful and considerate. I've been able to use the peel a couple times already, and it definitely makes my life easier when dealing with the super hot oven and pizza stone. Pizza slides in easily, and I have one side of the board dedicated to taking the pizza out as well as slicing the pizza on. I'm looking forward to improving my pizza making skills, and using this peel more.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Exemplary Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 19.6 x 12 pizza peel. After the first washing, a crack appeared along a seam on the front, and I contacted the seller and attached photos. They responded immediately. The size I had ordered was no longer available, but they offered to send me the extra-large peel as a replacement. It is perfect! It is a beautiful product that will also serve as a meat and cheese or fruit serving platter. I was extremely impressed with their exemplary customer service. Definitely order from Pizza Royale if you are looking for a pizza peel. You will be extremely pleased with both the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Oklahoman

customer_reviews.title: Might be good but wont find out.
customer_reviews.text: This looks like it would great for moving small pizzas into and out of the oven. Sadly mine arrived cracked down the middle. It appears the box made contact with something much harder than the peel right in the middle. Rather disappointing to receive a busted item.
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Essential pizza making tool
customer_reviews.text: Our order was quickly fulfilled. The shorter handle helps us more easily get everything into the pizza oven with all toppings intact. Just put a little bit of corn meal on the peel, make the pizza on the peel so that you don't have to slide a loaded crust onto it, and then slide it right in. The peel is an attractive and easy to clean bamboo. Anticipate many years of homemade family pizzas, flatbread, and Naan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Peel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one after returning another peel that I was dissatisfied with. This one is very nice, solid, smooth surface that doesn't require a lot of extra flour or cornmeal to get the crust to slide off. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ATC

customer_reviews.title: BUY A PEEL SOMEWHERE ELSE
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it, I was excited because I first saw the handle with no splits. As I looked on the main part, there was a huge split right down in the middle. Way to ruin a gift since the product does ensure its quality. Honestly, go to Marshalls and buy a peel because at least you can inspect those before you buy and are cheaper than this one. Wish I could get my money back on this
customer_reviews.author: dana n

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and works well for pizza parties!
customer_reviews.text: Just debuted this peel at our pizza party last night and everyone loved using it to make their pizza. We used some cornmeal after rolling out the pizza dough on the peel to make it easier to slide the pizza onto the stone in the oven. It worked like a charm. If you enjoy good pizza and you have a pizza stone this peel is recommended!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Nice big size
customer_reviews.text: Great pizza peel. Perfect large size to match our pizza stone. Great for transferring homemade pizza. Because of large size, there is t really anywhere to store it except in the oven. I’m fine with it, just have to remember before I preheat the oven!
customer_reviews.author: Jen and John Philipson

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, but too thick.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for baking pizzas in my home oven. Unfortunately, it's too thick, and it pushes the pizza to the back of the oven. Also, if the pizza is crusty, it slips around on the bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Jack

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Pizza Peel....Amazing Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Great price for a very well made product. Got it almost 2 weeks ago , used it almost 7 times for transferring pizza dough into a fire oven pizza. Temperature can reached up to 750 F and they held up well, bought three as I found it practical to prepare the flattened dough on its floured surface , the dough has less tendency to stick as compared to using a metal peel.
customer_reviews.author: Rjk9vet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sturdy Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, lip is good for scooping off of the stone. Can also double as a cutting board and looks very nice! Only complaint is that I'm having a tough time flooring this board enough to get a good transition from board to stone. Could be me, I'm still a little new to this, but have had better luck with other cutting boards that i have been ruining in the process. I will keep trying though because it is a beautiful sturdy tool.
customer_reviews.author: SJMJ

customer_reviews.title: Look boss slinging a pizza paddle!
customer_reviews.text: My pizzas suck, but I look like a pro with this thing! Up your cooking game +10 points when walking around the kitchen with this in hand. No need to be a pro pizza person, when you look amazing slinging this paddle. Great for other activities too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Updating

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Royale Peel
customer_reviews.text: Love the new pizza peel. Used it last night for the first time. It worked like a charm. We did use corn meal on it and that sure did the trick. We also used it with our gas Weber BBQ and slid the dough right onto the grate. Was so much better than using our big clunky cutting board. We like it so much we are taking it camping to use on our little Weber grill. Plan on making grilled pizzas in the campground as it was so easy. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: Loved the customer attention that was payed to me. The little cookbook was an extra surprise that will come in handy. The pizza peel is nice and light. Not heavy to handle. Not to long so it can be stored in my cabinet. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Helen M.

customer_reviews.title: an elegant tool that is practical and attractive too
customer_reviews.text: The pizza peel is great. I have received it and have already used it with my new pizza stone. The bamboo grain is lovely, the size is perfect, and the thin edge is just perfect for getting under the pizza to maneuver the pizza on the hot stone without creating any mess or mishaps (or fingertip burns). Barbara Johnson
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love my first pizza peel!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Pizza Peel, it is the perfect size and thickness for my intended use (I plan to bake breads and use this to place them on the stone). The quality is very good, and I did not note any defects or splintered areas in the wood. Very happy with the quality and the price of this item!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cross

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product. I have used it with fresh pizza dough and it worked as expected. Always remember to use cornmeal to prevent sticking when transferring the pizza in and out of the oven. Great product for the price and I would recommend this pizza peel to any home pizza enthusiast. Item was received well packaged and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but, if you've never used one before...
customer_reviews.text: ...don't be like me the first time I used it and just put a scattering of corn meal on the thing before you set down your pizza dough. The dough will stick. Put down three times as much corn meal as looks like enough, and then only let the dough rest on the peel for less than a minute - or what was supposed to be pizza will be a small tragedy.
customer_reviews.author: P. T. Gentile

customer_reviews.title: Good Strong Wood
customer_reviews.text: I have a bamboo cutting board I use daily and have had it for years. This peel fits comfortable a 12 inch pizza. Can't go wrong with this . . . a good product.
customer_reviews.author: clvmprofesora

customer_reviews.title: Great for home pies
customer_reviews.text: Works great for homemade pizza pies. I recommend gravity stretching the dough into oval shaped pizzas. Use cornmeal to keep it from sticking to the peel and move fast when you build your pies. Works great, smells great, and recommend it for 12” diameter home pies.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! We made homemade pizza this past weekend ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product ! We made homemade pizza this past weekend with it, and my husband loved it !! Pizza slides right off, no problem, in fact we will be ordering a second one, we are a family of pizza lovers, and this product made it so much easier to put into oven.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Newby-Young

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pizza peel!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new pizza peel. I used to have one when I was growing up and totally missed it when I finally grew up and was out on my own. Making pizzas for myself was always a matter of "how do I take this out of the oven in one piece?" before I purchased your pizza peel. It is exactly like the one that I grew up with and I love it so much. Thank you for the quality product and the memories.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Lemmiksoo

customer_reviews.title: Works great and wonderfully crafted
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tool to use in my convection oven. Before this I used two slotted turners to get my pizzas out...what a mess! This peel slid under the pizza and pulled it out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: lovelife

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and useful
customer_reviews.text: The pizza peel is well made and looks great. It is the perfect size for my pizza making. Pizza dough slides off well with the proper addition of flour on the peel.
customer_reviews.author: D. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza peel!
customer_reviews.text: Great pizza peel. Light, beveled edges. Just the right size for a homemade crust. I couldn't decide between a 4 or 5 star review because the handle is a bit short so my hand gets a bit hot in the oven. But when I though about it some more, I realized that if it were longer, it would be a little more difficult to manage with one hand. I love that it is made of bamboo. I've used it several times and there is no sign of any wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my last one. However, with great sturdiness comes great weight. I don't find it heavy, but my wife notices the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ferrare

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza peel. I bought this in early 2019 and it's held up wonderfully. Easy to wash with soap and water, and then rub with a light layer of oil to keep the wood supple. I wouldn't recommend cutting or using this as a serving board if you want to keep it splinter free.
customer_reviews.author: Lise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Peel
customer_reviews.text: I love this pizza peel. I purchased it to augment the stock metal pizza peel from my Breville Pizzaiolo Oven. This peel fits inside that oven perfectly. My dough sticks to metal peels instantly. Transitioning to this bamboo peel improved my pizzas right away. It is crafted well. A little flour makes the pizza slide right off into the oven with no effort. And cleaning is a breeze. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Lewis

customer_reviews.title: So glad to have a great pizza peel!
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted a pizza peel for a while, and found it on Amazon.....the wood is beautiful (not that that has anything to do with the function), and it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Grace L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice pizza peel for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I saw some reviews of getting some with the wood cracked. I personally did not. It’s built pretty solid. It feels good in hand. I recommend (with all wood and metal objects), treating it with a material proper and food friendly oil to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Art for Your Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product and even fun to look at. I have mine up in the kitchen where it can be seen. So far I have used it when making several loaves of bread and it does the job excellently. As someone who is new to cooking, I am quite happy to make this one of my first purchases. I cannot wait to use it for its true purpose - making delicious pizza. Get yours today!
customer_reviews.author: sfairbro

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened this package for Christmas so I have not tried it out yet. It looks like it will be great however. Very solid and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice and large for a good sized pizza.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and looks quite nice. Have not used it yet, but looks to be sturdy and of good quality. Nice and large for a good sized pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Teresafahey

customer_reviews.title: This peel is great! Now I can keep all my toppings on ...
customer_reviews.text: This peel is great! Now I can keep all my toppings on the pizza. Before, when one piece of peproni would fall into the oven, it would set off the smoke alarm, when the pizza was done. So I thank you and the dog thanks you!
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: The item came in what looked like good condition. My brother in law used it one time and it cracked. A 6 inch crack down the center. All he did was take a pizza out of the oven with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exactly as described. Perfect for cooking or reheating pizza. If you eat a frozen pizza now and then, it’s very much worth buying and hanging on a wall near the oven.
customer_reviews.author: rscottp

customer_reviews.title: Weak seams
customer_reviews.text: Had this board for just under a year but only used it a dozen times and it split along one of the seams. The board was always hand washed and dried then rested on it's side to make sure there was no residual moisture to damage it. Loved the size and handle length, too bad it didn't last with minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: We really love the pizza royale. We had a bit of shipping issues because we are in a brand new home, but I was able to resolve and reroute to our local FedEx store office. My husband eats a lot of pizza and so do our Littles, so this pizza royale has been amazing so far in our home. Very sturdy. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hammes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: First time making pizzas at home. This is a very nice pizza peel. Very easy to clean. Nicely packed when it arrived and fast delivery too! I will sure to keep it well and use it many many times for years to come. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Works just as described
customer_reviews.text: Works great - just as described. Better than the peel I had which came with my Roccboxx. That one had perforations in it causing the pizza to not slide easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Love my Pizza Royale pizza peel!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for making bread or pizza on the grill and I'm very happy with my purchase. It's a good size. Perfect for the home and looks good hanging on the wall, too. Also, had a shipping delay and the nice people from the seller proactively reached out to me and took care of it. Great service!
customer_reviews.author: CK in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant. I love it
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you make your own pizza! I rolled the pizza dough directly onto the pizza paddle. I preheated the pizza stone in the oven and then slid the pizza onto the hot stone to bake. No more sticking or losing toppings !! Brilliant. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Peppa

customer_reviews.title: KIDS SIZE! Will make a great cheese tray!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize it was a kids toy when I ordered it! Could never get a regular pizza out of the over with it, but it’s really pretty and nice quality! I’ll use it to serve cheese on or something!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old cracked pizza board and I finally decided to replace it. When I checked the reviews on line, this one seemed like a good choice. I haven't used it yet, but it certainly looks like it will hold up much better than my earlier version. It's quite attractive and seems to be great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Senatorjane

customer_reviews.title: Love this peel
customer_reviews.text: Love this peel! Worked perfectly for transferring pizza into and out if oven. We prefer a crunchy crust so cooking directly on oven rack accomplishes that. Peel is aesthetically pleasing too, looks great hanging on my kitchen. It will also make a wonderful cheeseboard. I feel as if I got my $$ worth, and that is a rate thing these days. If you make pizza at home, or get take and bake, I highly, highly recommend. Great, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Nehls

customer_reviews.title: A very well made product.
customer_reviews.text: Great feedback with recipes from company. Worked well on 3 pizzas especially after I read company's recommendations re. correct technique when using.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Way above average
customer_reviews.text: This is a premium product that from first look and use proves itself to be what it claims to be. I have used another one over the years that needed replacing so my wife ordered this one for me and size-wise it is perfect (not too small) and it is sturdy and the wood is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Michael Nace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have used this peel on one occasion so far. Made three pizzas to throw in my new pizza pronto and everything went well. My wife was concerned about storing the peels that I bought but this one is so pretty she wants to hang it on the wall in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Luis P.

customer_reviews.title: The REAL Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Worked perfectly. We did our first pizza night for my family and cooked 3 pizzas on our Weber Pizza Oven. It was fun and delicious. This company REALLY cares about their customers. They give you a free recipe book that can be downloaded which was really helpful. I would say they have been the most involved seller I've ever used on Amazon. Two thumbs up!!! Thank you Mary!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisolavitch

customer_reviews.title: Makes pizza night special!
customer_reviews.text: Seems silly I guess, but the addition of this Pizza Royale board has brought ordinary pizza way up a notch. Just seems more special. Plus, it's exceptionally practical. Whether I cook the pizza in the oven or in our BBQ attachment, taking it out with the Pizza board gives a bit of "voila"'to,the experience.
customer_reviews.author: Old Blondie

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, works great, could have a thinner edge
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do and looks nice. I wish the edge was thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift to my son.
customer_reviews.text: The Pizza Royale Peel was a Christmas gift to my son. He is still living with me, so I am so looking forward to him making homemade pizza. A guide to making pizza was also available, at first I couldn't download it, but I wrote back and they answered right away. I have printed it out, and again I can't wait to try some of the recipes. I read they are a small family business, I am tending to believe them with the fast response I received.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ferro

customer_reviews.title: It worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I love making pizza on the grill, but always struggled to get the dough on to the hot grill without folding over and making a mess. I found this pizza peel worked very well, even the first time. I used lots of cornmeal on the peel then laid dough out and it worked beautifully. I divided store bought dough in half since the peel is relatively small.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: I have been very pleased with the look
customer_reviews.text: The first pizza peel I received started to separate at one of the glue seams, but I contacted the seller and they quickly sent me a replacement. Besides the defect in the first unit, I have been very pleased with the look, weight and value. I would have no hesitation purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Will C.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the pleasure to use the peel once. But it worked amazingly well. No burning my finger, hands, arms anymore. 😉
customer_reviews.author: SRobin

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: I love this pizza paddle. My mom had a similar one when I was a kid, and as an adult I'm so glad I finally got my own!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Gillmore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've not used it yet but love the look and feel it. I'm making pizzas for my daughters bday this saturday, so we'll see how well it handles the pizzas. I give a fivebc I too have a small home based business and appreciatethe effortsof my fellow associates! Good luck yall!! God bless.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee S.

customer_reviews.title: No problems at all
customer_reviews.text: We used our new pizza peel for the first time last night -- to slide a pizza onto our Lodge cast-iron pan, which gets HOT. I have never used a peel before; the pie slid right off and onto the pan, perfectly. Only one mushroom slice fell off, which made me feel quite ept. The peel does its job, cleans easily, looks good, and is "ethically sourced," so we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Spilman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, but thin enough with an even bevel ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it for pizza yet, but I did use it for baking some bread. It worked perfectly--smooth transition of loaves onto the pizza stone. Sturdy construction, but thin enough with an even bevel that makes it easy to get underneath cooked loaves.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Sturdy. Takes a little getting used to but, overall totally recommend. It’s beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Stacie G

customer_reviews.title: It was great untill it fell from a hight of a few ...
customer_reviews.text: It was great untill it fell from a hight of a few cm (from the counter into the sink) and broke into 2 pieces! This happend after only 3 months and maybe 4 pizzas. I'm very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pizza Royale Ethically Sourced Premium Natural Bamboo Pizza Peel, 19.6 Inch x 12 Inch
feature_bullets: ✅ MULTI-PURPOSE; The possibilities for this product don't just end with pizzas. Use it for placing and removing bread and other baking goods to and from the oven. Use it as a bread, cheese and cutting board - not to mention it's perfect to use as a serving block. It’s extremely practical for everyday use.

✅ LARGE; at 19.6 Inch x 12 inches, our large size is perfectly crafted for the beginner, intermediate or veteran pizza-crafter. Our best-selling pizza peel is perfect for special occasions or pizza nights and is sure to impress friends & family.

✅ EASY GRIP HANDLE; Our large size paddle is 19.6 x 12 inch. It’s sturdy but not too heavy to hold even when topped with your homemade or shop bought pizza. It’s made even easier with the handle's contoured design. It makes food preparation and baking fun and simple.

✅ NO SPLITTING, WARPING OR CRACKING; When cared for properly, Pizza Royale's Bamboo pizza peel will not split, warp or splinter. Your hands are the only ones you’ve got … don’t get splinters in them by buying cheaply produced peels. Easy cleaning - just hand wash with warm water.

✅ 180 DAY GUARANTEE; At Pizza Royale, we care deeply about our customers. That’s why we want to make your experience as pleasurable and stress-free as possible. Our pizza peels are backed up by a 180 day guarantee! Order NOW – it’s a risk-free purchase! CLICK the Orange button to Order Now!
